original_text: There is nobody who never does a wrong thing. So when your people do not obey you, you will be angry with them. You will put them under the power of their enemies. Those enemies will take them as prisoners to their own country. Perhaps it will be a country that is far away. Perhaps it will be near.
korean_text: 범죄하지 아니하는 사람이 없사오니 그들이 주께 범죄함으로 주께서 그들에게 진노하사 그들을 적국에게 넘기시매 적국이 그들을 사로잡아 원근을 막론하고 적국의 땅으로 끌어간 후에

sentences.original_text: There is nobody who never does a wrong thing
sentences.korean_translation: 잘못된 일을 전혀 하지 않는 사람은 아무도 없습니다

sentences.original_text: So when your people do not obey you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신의 백성이 당신에게 순종하지 않을 때

sentences.original_text: you will be angry with them
You will put them under the power of their enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 원수의 권세 아래 두실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Those enemies will take them as prisoners
sentences.korean_translation: 그 원수들은 그들을 포로로 잡아갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Perhaps it will be a country that is far away
